name: PODRAVKA d.d.
nace: Other processing and preserving of fruit and vegetables
sectorName: Manufacture of food products, beverages and tobacco products
description:
Podravka is a Croatian multinational company with headquarters in Koprivnica and one of the leading companies in Southeast, Central and Eastern Europe. Its production facilities are located in four and active trading companies in sixteen countries. Podravka's products are exported to more than sixty countries around the world, including the United States of America and Australia.

The Podravka Group operates in two segments, Food and Pharmaceuticals (Belupo) and has more than 1,800 products in its portfolio.

Podravka is an innovative leader with a number of strong brands, such as Vegeta, Dolcela, Podravka, Å½ito, Lino, Eva, Fant, Fini-Mini, Kviki and many others.

The Podravka Group operates on the principles of sustainable business, is a responsible employer with high standards of corporate governance and a responsible member of the community.
